results.name: sdwan
results.help: Configure redundant Internet connections with multiple outbound links and health-check profiles.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable SD-WAN.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable SD-WAN.

load-balance-mode.name: load-balance-mode
load-balance-mode.help: Algorithm or mode to use for load balancing Internet traffic to SD-WAN members.

options.name: source-ip-based
options.help: Source IP load balancing. All traffic from a source IP is sent to the same interface.

options.name: weight-based
options.help: Weight-based load balancing. Interfaces with higher weights have higher priority and get more traffic.

options.name: usage-based
options.help: Usage-based load balancing. All traffic is sent to the first interface on the list. When the bandwidth on that interface exceeds the spill-over limit new traffic is sent to the next interface.

options.name: source-dest-ip-based
options.help: Source and destination IP load balancing. All traffic from a source IP to a destination IP is sent to the same interface.

options.name: measured-volume-based
options.help: Volume-based load balancing. Traffic is load balanced based on traffic volume (in bytes). More traffic is sent to interfaces with higher volume ratios.

speedtest-bypass-routing.name: speedtest-bypass-routing
speedtest-bypass-routing.help: Enable/disable bypass routing when speedtest on a SD-WAN member.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable SD-WAN.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable SD-WAN.

duplication-max-num.name: duplication-max-num
duplication-max-num.help: Maximum number of interface members a packet is duplicated in the SD-WAN zone (2 - 4, default = 2; if set to 3, the original packet plus 2 more copies are created).

neighbor-hold-down.name: neighbor-hold-down
neighbor-hold-down.help: Enable/disable hold switching from the secondary neighbor to the primary neighbor.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable hold switching from the secondary neighbor to the primary neighbor.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable hold switching from the secondary neighbor to the primary neighbor.

neighbor-hold-down-time.name: neighbor-hold-down-time
neighbor-hold-down-time.help: Waiting period in seconds when switching from the secondary neighbor to the primary neighbor when hold-down is disabled. (0 - 10000000, default = 0).

neighbor-hold-boot-time.name: neighbor-hold-boot-time
neighbor-hold-boot-time.help: Waiting period in seconds when switching from the primary neighbor to the secondary neighbor from the neighbor start. (0 - 10000000, default = 0).

fail-detect.name: fail-detect
fail-detect.help: Enable/disable SD-WAN Internet connection status checking (failure detection).

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable status checking.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable status checking.

fail-alert-interfaces.name: fail-alert-interfaces
fail-alert-interfaces.help: Physical interfaces that will be alerted.

service-sla-tie-break.name: service-sla-tie-break
service-sla-tie-break.help: Method of selecting member if more than one meets the SLA.

options.name: cfg-order
options.help: Members that meet the SLA are selected in the order they are configured.

options.name: fib-best-match
options.help: Members that meet the SLA are selected that match the longest prefix in the routing table.

members.name: members
members.help: FortiGate interfaces added to the SD-WAN.

gateway.name: gateway
gateway.help: The default gateway for this interface. Usually the default gateway of the Internet service provider that this interface is connected to.

source.name: source
source.help: Source IP address used in the health-check packet to the server.

source6.name: source6
source6.help: Source IPv6 address used in the health-check packet to the server.

cost.name: cost
cost.help: Cost of this interface for services in SLA mode (0 - 4294967295, default = 0).

weight.name: weight
weight.help: Weight of this interface for weighted load balancing. (1 - 255) More traffic is directed to interfaces with higher weights.

priority.name: priority
priority.help: Priority of the interface for IPv4 (0 - 65535, default = 0). Used for SD-WAN rules or priority rules.

priority6.name: priority6
priority6.help: Priority of the interface for IPv6 (1 - 65535, default = 1024). Used for SD-WAN rules or priority rules.

spillover-threshold.name: spillover-threshold
spillover-threshold.help: Egress spillover threshold for this interface (0 - 16776000 kbit/s). When this traffic volume threshold is reached, new sessions spill over to other interfaces in the SD-WAN.

ingress-spillover-threshold.name: ingress-spillover-threshold
ingress-spillover-threshold.help: Ingress spillover threshold for this interface (0 - 16776000 kbit/s). When this traffic volume threshold is reached, new sessions spill over to other interfaces in the SD-WAN.

volume-ratio.name: volume-ratio
volume-ratio.help: Measured volume ratio (this value / sum of all values = percentage of link volume, 1 - 255).

status.name: status
status.help: Enable/disable this interface in the SD-WAN.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable this interface in the SD-WAN.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable this interface in the SD-WAN.

health-check.name: health-check
health-check.help: SD-WAN status checking or health checking. Identify a server on the Internet and determine how SD-WAN verifies that the FortiGate can communicate with it.

name.name: name
name.help: Status check or health check name.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable transmission of probe packets.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable transmission of probe packets.

options.name: ipv4
options.help: IPv4 mode.

options.name: ipv6
options.help: IPv6 mode.

system-dns.name: system-dns
system-dns.help: Enable/disable system DNS as the probe server.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable system DNS as the probe server.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable system DNS as the probe server.

server.name: server
server.help: IP address or FQDN name of the server.

detect-mode.name: detect-mode
detect-mode.help: The mode determining how to detect the server.

options.name: active
options.help: The probes are sent actively.

options.name: passive
options.help: The traffic measures health without probes.

options.name: prefer-passive
options.help: The probes are sent in case of no new traffic.

protocol.name: protocol
protocol.help: Protocol used to determine if the FortiGate can communicate with the server.

options.name: ping
options.help: Use PING to test the link with the server.

options.name: tcp-echo
options.help: Use TCP echo to test the link with the server.

options.name: udp-echo
options.help: Use UDP echo to test the link with the server.

options.name: http
options.help: Use HTTP-GET to test the link with the server.

options.name: twamp
options.help: Use TWAMP to test the link with the server.

options.name: dns
options.help: Use DNS query to test the link with the server.

options.name: tcp-connect
options.help: Use a full TCP connection to test the link with the server.

options.name: ftp
options.help: Use FTP to test the link with the server.

port.name: port
port.help: Port number used to communicate with the server over the selected protocol (0-65535, default = 0, auto select. http, tcp-connect: 80, udp-echo, tcp-echo: 7, dns: 53, ftp: 21, twamp: 862).

quality-measured-method.name: quality-measured-method
quality-measured-method.help: Method to measure the quality of tcp-connect.

options.name: half-open
options.help: Measure the round trip between syn and ack.

options.name: half-close
options.help: Measure the round trip between fin and ack.

options.name: none
options.help: Unauthenticated mode.

options.name: authentication
options.help: Authenticated mode.

user.name: user
user.help: The user name to access probe server.

password.name: password
password.help: Twamp controller password in authentication mode

packet-size.name: packet-size
packet-size.help: Packet size of a twamp test session,

options.name: passive
options.help: The FTP health-check initiates and establishes the data connection.

options.name: port
options.help: The FTP server initiates and establishes the data connection.

ftp-file.name: ftp-file
ftp-file.help: Full path and file name on the FTP server to download for FTP health-check to probe.

http-get.name: http-get
http-get.help: URL used to communicate with the server if the protocol if the protocol is HTTP.

http-agent.name: http-agent
http-agent.help: String in the http-agent field in the HTTP header.

http-match.name: http-match
http-match.help: Response string expected from the server if the protocol is HTTP.

dns-request-domain.name: dns-request-domain
dns-request-domain.help: Fully qualified domain name to resolve for the DNS probe.

dns-match-ip.name: dns-match-ip
dns-match-ip.help: Response IP expected from DNS server if the protocol is DNS.

interval.name: interval
interval.help: Status check interval in milliseconds, or the time between attempting to connect to the server (500 - 3600*1000 msec, default = 500).

probe-timeout.name: probe-timeout
probe-timeout.help: Time to wait before a probe packet is considered lost (500 - 3600*1000 msec, default = 500).

failtime.name: failtime
failtime.help: Number of failures before server is considered lost (1 - 3600, default = 5).

recoverytime.name: recoverytime
recoverytime.help: Number of successful responses received before server is considered recovered (1 - 3600, default = 5).

probe-count.name: probe-count
probe-count.help: Number of most recent probes that should be used to calculate latency and jitter (5 - 30, default = 30).

diffservcode.name: diffservcode
diffservcode.help: Differentiated services code point (DSCP) in the IP header of the probe packet.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable update cascade interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable update cascade interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable updating the static route.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable updating the static route.

sla-fail-log-period.name: sla-fail-log-period
sla-fail-log-period.help: Time interval in seconds that SLA fail log messages will be generated (0 - 3600, default = 0).

sla-pass-log-period.name: sla-pass-log-period
sla-pass-log-period.help: Time interval in seconds that SLA pass log messages will be generated (0 - 3600, default = 0).

threshold-warning-packetloss.name: threshold-warning-packetloss
threshold-warning-packetloss.help: Warning threshold for packet loss (percentage, default = 0).

threshold-alert-packetloss.name: threshold-alert-packetloss
threshold-alert-packetloss.help: Alert threshold for packet loss (percentage, default = 0).

link-cost-factor.name: link-cost-factor
link-cost-factor.help: Criteria on which to base link selection.

options.name: latency
options.help: Select link based on latency.

options.name: jitter
options.help: Select link based on jitter.

options.name: packet-loss
options.help: Select link based on packet loss.

latency-threshold.name: latency-threshold
latency-threshold.help: Latency for SLA to make decision in milliseconds. (0 - 10000000, default = 5).

jitter-threshold.name: jitter-threshold
jitter-threshold.help: Jitter for SLA to make decision in milliseconds. (0 - 10000000, default = 5).

packetloss-threshold.name: packetloss-threshold
packetloss-threshold.help: Packet loss for SLA to make decision in percentage. (0 - 100, default = 0).

neighbor.name: neighbor
neighbor.help: Create SD-WAN neighbor from BGP neighbor table to control route advertisements according to SLA status.

mode.name: mode
mode.help: What metric to select the neighbor.

options.name: sla
options.help: Select neighbor based on SLA link quality.

options.name: speedtest
options.help: Select neighbor based on the speedtest status.

options.name: standalone
options.help: Standalone neighbor.

options.name: primary
options.help: Primary neighbor.

options.name: secondary
options.help: Secondary neighbor.

service.name: service
service.help: Create SD-WAN rules (also called services) to control how sessions are distributed to interfaces in the SD-WAN.

options.name: ipv4
options.help: IPv4 mode.

options.name: ipv6
options.help: IPv6 mode.

input-device-negate.name: input-device-negate
input-device-negate.help: Enable/disable negation of input device match.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable negation of input device match.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable negation of input device match.

mode.name: mode
mode.help: Control how the SD-WAN rule sets the priority of interfaces in the SD-WAN.

options.name: auto
options.help: Assign interfaces a priority based on quality.

options.name: manual
options.help: Assign interfaces a priority manually.

options.name: priority
options.help: Assign interfaces a priority based on the link-cost-factor quality of the interface.

options.name: sla
options.help: Assign interfaces a priority based on selected SLA settings.

options.name: load-balance
options.help: Distribute traffic among all available links based on round robin. ADVPN feature is not supported in the mode.

minimum-sla-meet-members.name: minimum-sla-meet-members
minimum-sla-meet-members.help: Minimum number of members which meet SLA.

hash-mode.name: hash-mode
hash-mode.help: Hash algorithm for selected priority members for load balance mode.

options.name: round-robin
options.help: All traffic are distributed to selected interfaces in equal portions and circular order.

options.name: source-ip-based
options.help: All traffic from a source IP is sent to the same interface.

options.name: source-dest-ip-based
options.help: All traffic from a source IP to a destination IP is sent to the same interface.

options.name: inbandwidth
options.help: All traffic are distributed to a selected interface with most available bandwidth for incoming traffic.

options.name: outbandwidth
options.help: All traffic are distributed to a selected interface with most available bandwidth for outgoing traffic.

options.name: bibandwidth
options.help: All traffic are distributed to a selected interface with most available bandwidth for both incoming and outgoing traffic.

role.name: role
role.help: Service role to work with neighbor.

options.name: standalone
options.help: Standalone service.

options.name: primary
options.help: Primary service for primary neighbor.

options.name: secondary
options.help: Secondary service for secondary neighbor.

standalone-action.name: standalone-action
standalone-action.help: Enable/disable service when selected neighbor role is standalone while service role is not standalone.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable service when selected neighbor role is standalone.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable service when selected neighbor role is standalone.

dst-negate.name: dst-negate
dst-negate.help: Enable/disable negation of destination address match.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable destination address negation.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable destination address negation.

src-negate.name: src-negate
src-negate.help: Enable/disable negation of source address match.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable source address negation.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable source address negation.

internet-service.name: internet-service
internet-service.help: Enable/disable use of Internet service for application-based load balancing.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable cloud service to support application-based load balancing.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable cloud service to support application-based load balancing.

internet-service-app-ctrl.name: internet-service-app-ctrl
internet-service-app-ctrl.help: Application control based Internet Service ID list.

id.name: id
id.help: Application control based Internet Service ID.

internet-service-app-ctrl-group.name: internet-service-app-ctrl-group
internet-service-app-ctrl-group.help: Application control based Internet Service group list.

name.name: name
name.help: Application control based Internet Service group name.

options.name: latency
options.help: Select link based on latency.

options.name: jitter
options.help: Select link based on jitter.

options.name: packet-loss
options.help: Select link based on packet loss.

options.name: inbandwidth
options.help: Select link based on available bandwidth of incoming traffic.

options.name: outbandwidth
options.help: Select link based on available bandwidth of outgoing traffic.

options.name: bibandwidth
options.help: Select link based on available bandwidth of bidirectional traffic.

options.name: custom-profile-1
options.help: Select link based on customized profile.

packet-loss-weight.name: packet-loss-weight
packet-loss-weight.help: Coefficient of packet-loss in the formula of custom-profile-1.

latency-weight.name: latency-weight
latency-weight.help: Coefficient of latency in the formula of custom-profile-1.

jitter-weight.name: jitter-weight
jitter-weight.help: Coefficient of jitter in the formula of custom-profile-1.

bandwidth-weight.name: bandwidth-weight
bandwidth-weight.help: Coefficient of reciprocal of available bidirectional bandwidth in the formula of custom-profile-1.

link-cost-threshold.name: link-cost-threshold
link-cost-threshold.help: Percentage threshold change of link cost values that will result in policy route regeneration (0 - 10000000, default = 10).

hold-down-time.name: hold-down-time
hold-down-time.help: Waiting period in seconds when switching from the back-up member to the primary member (0 - 10000000, default = 0).

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable use of forward DSCP tag.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable use of forward DSCP tag.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable use of reverse DSCP tag.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable use of reverse DSCP tag.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable SD-WAN service.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable SD-WAN service.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable SD-WAN service gateway.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable SD-WAN service gateway.

default.name: default
default.help: Enable/disable use of SD-WAN as default service.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable use of SD-WAN as default service.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable use of SD-WAN as default service.

sla-compare-method.name: sla-compare-method
sla-compare-method.help: Method to compare SLA value for SLA mode.

options.name: order
options.help: Compare SLA value based on the order of health-check.

options.name: number
options.help: Compare SLA value based on the number of satisfied health-check.  Limits health-checks to only configured member interfaces.

tie-break.name: tie-break
tie-break.help: Method of selecting member if more than one meets the SLA.

options.name: zone
options.help: Use the setting that is configured for the members' zone.

options.name: cfg-order
options.help: Members that meet the SLA are selected in the order they are configured.

options.name: fib-best-match
options.help: Members that meet the SLA are selected that match the longest prefix in the routing table.

use-shortcut-sla.name: use-shortcut-sla
use-shortcut-sla.help: Enable/disable use of ADVPN shortcut for quality comparison.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable use of ADVPN shortcut for quality comparison.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable use of ADVPN shortcut for quality comparison.

passive-measurement.name: passive-measurement
passive-measurement.help: Enable/disable passive measurement based on the service criteria.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable passive measurement of user traffic.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable passive measurement of user traffic.

srcaddr.name: srcaddr
srcaddr.help: Source address or address group names.

dstaddr.name: dstaddr
dstaddr.help: Destination address or address group names.

srcaddr6.name: srcaddr6
srcaddr6.help: Source address6 or address6 group names.

dstaddr6.name: dstaddr6
dstaddr6.help: Destination address6 or address6 group names.

name.name: name
name.help: Interface, zone or SDWAN zone name.

name.name: name
name.help: Interface, zone or SDWAN zone name.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable packet duplication.

options.name: force
options.help: Duplicate packets across all interface members of the SD-WAN zone.

options.name: on-demand
options.help: Duplicate packets across all interface members of the SD-WAN zone based on the link quality.

packet-de-duplication.name: packet-de-duplication
packet-de-duplication.help: Enable/disable discarding of packets that have been duplicated.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable discarding of packets that have been duplicated.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable discarding of packets that have been duplicated.
